message.raw: Fixed a bug where job submission was horribly slow due to Python attempting to use IPv6 for the request. This failed after a timeout (which was the source of the slowdown), after which the IPv4 address was used. I've now forced it to use IPv4.
message.html: Fixed a bug where job submission was horribly slow due to Python attempting to use IPv6 for the request. This failed after a timeout (which was the source of the slowdown), after which the IPv4 address was used. I've now forced it to use IPv4.
